value: 3 DCs - Main DC (250,000 sq ft), Regional DC East (120,000 sq ft), Regional DC West (150,000 sq ft)
Returns processing area, QC inspection zone, receiving docks (12 doors), shipping docks (18 doors), kitting/VAS area, packing stations, cross-dock area
Selective pallet racking (60%), floor stacking (20%), flow racks (15%), small parts bins (5%)
Reach trucks (12), counterbalance forklifts (8), pallet jacks (25), conveyor systems in main DC
87% average - Main DC at 92%, Regional facilities at 80-85%
Pallet racking, drive-in racking for high-density storage, shelving for small parts, floor stacking for bulk items
Client-owned inventory, consignment models for some retail clients
Yes - lot tracking for food/beverage clients, serial tracking for electronics
Cycle counting program - A items weekly, B items monthly, C items quarterly
FIFO for perishables and fashion, FEFO for food items, LIFO for some industrial products
Yes - separate zones per client, some shared space for overflow
Average 45 days, varies by client from 15-90 days
Quarantine area for damaged goods, separate returns processing zone with inspection stations
Monthly physical counts for high-value items, annual full inventory for all clients
